mapper.select: SELECT report_id, reporter_id, report_content, report_date, CASE WHEN report_type = 'SA1' THEN '욕설' WHEN report_type = 'SA2' THEN '음란성' WHEN report_type = 'SA3' THEN '모욕/비방' WHEN report_type = 'SA4' THEN '사기' WHEN report_type = 'SA5' THEN '기타' END AS report_type, CASE WHEN report_process_type = 'SB1' THEN '신고처리' WHEN report_process_type = 'SB2' THEN '반려' END AS report_process_type FROM report ORDER BY report_id
